"core-version": "5.2.8-prerelease", "source": "https://plm.tiddlyhost.com/#:[[$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly]]", "list": "readme settings", "parent-plugin": "", "dependents": "", "plugin-type": "plugin", "packaged-by": "Gatha on 8th May 2023, 12:27:53" }", "modified": "20230508102753018" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/readme": { "created": "20230427225722135", "text": "{{||$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/templates/readme}}", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/readme", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "tags": "", "modified": "20230427231554703" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings": { "created": "20220505193946834", "text": "\define enable-autosave() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/AutoSave" text="yes"/> \end \define disable-autosave() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/AutoSave" text=""/> \end \define set-current-sidebar-tab() <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856" $field="text" $filter="[[$:/tags/SideBar]tagging[]first[]]"/> \end \define StartupAction() <$let read-only={{{ [subfilter{!!ReadOnlyFilter}] }}}> <$list filter="[match[true]]" variable=_> <$list filter="[match[true]]" variable="_" emptyMessage=<> ><> <$list filter="[list[!!config-visibility]]" variable="UI-elements"> <$list filter="[getenlist-input[]has[text]]" variable="UI-element"> <$list filter="[search:title[Buttons]]" variable=_> <$tiddler tiddler={{{ $:/config/[]/Visibility/[]+[join[]] }}}> <$list filter="[match[true]]" variable=_> <$action-setfield initial={{!!text}}/> <$action-setfield text="hide"/> <$list filter="[is[current]has[initial]]:filter[match[false]]" variable=_> <$action-setfield text={{!!initial}} /> <$list filter="[search:title[tabs]]:filter[match[true]]" variable="_" > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="-[[$:/tags/SideBar]] +[[$:/tags/SideBar/disabled]]" /> <$list filter="[search:title[tabs]]:filter[match[false]]" variable="_" > <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags="+[[$:/tags/SideBar]] -[[$:/tags/SideBar/disabled]]" /> <> \end \define checkbox(state,field) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions=""" <$action-listops $field="$field$" $subfilter="+[toggle]" /> <$list filter="[[$state$]!match[checked]]" variable="_"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[][search:title[$:/config/]search:title]"/> <> """> \end \define toggle-visibility(filter,field) <$list filter="$filter$" variable="toggle">
\end \define check-all() <> <$action-setmultiplefields $fields="[list[!!config-visibility]]" $values=" "/> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=""" $:/tags/ViewToolbar $:/tags/PageControls $:/tags/SideBar $:/tags/SideBar/disabled +[tagging[]] [search:title[$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons]] [search:title[$:/config/PageControlButtons]] """/> \end \define uncheck-all() <> <$action-setmultiplefields $fields="[list[!!config-visibility]]" $values=""" [[$:/tags/PageControls]tagging[]format:titlelist[]join[ ]] [[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]tagging[]format:titlelist[]join[ ]] [subfilter[$:/tags/SideBar $:/tags/SideBar/disabled]tagging[]format:titlelist[]join[ ]] """/> \end \define save-changes() <> <$wikify name="site-title" text={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki" $param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} filename=<>/> \end \define tabList() [[View toolbar]] [[Page controls]] [[Sidebar tabs]] [[Custom CSS]] [[Settings]] \define tabViewToolbar()

Select which buttons can be displayed in read only mode.

<$macrocall $name="toggle-visibility" filter="[[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]tagging[]]" field="ViewToolbarButtons"/> \end \define tabPageControls()

Select which buttons can be displayed in read only mode.

<$macrocall $name="toggle-visibility" filter="[[$:/tags/PageControls]tagging[]]" field="PageControlButtons"/> \end \define tabSidebarTabs()

Select which tabs can be displayed in read only mode.

<$macrocall $name="toggle-visibility" filter="$:/tags/SideBar $:/tags/SideBar/disabled +[tagging[]sort[]]" field="SideBarSegments/tabs"/> \end \define tabCustomCSS()

Write custom CSS rules to enable in read only mode.

<$edit-text field="ReadOnlyCSS" tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor full-width"/> \end \define tabSettings()

<$button actions=<> >Hide all <$button actions=<> >Reset <$button actions=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/SaveWiki/Caption}}/>

Below is the filter used to trigger the read only.

<$edit-text field="ReadOnlyFilter" tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor full-width"/>

<$radio field="override" value="true"> on <$radio field="override" value="false"> off <$radio field="override" value=""> auto

Read only is <$text text={{{ [subfilter{!!ReadOnlyFilter}match[true]then[on]else[off]] }}}/>.

\end <$tiddler tiddler="$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings"> <> <$let stateTab=<> >
<$list filter=<> variable="currentTab"> <$button set=<> setTo=<> selectedClass="tc-tab-selected"><>
<$let defaultTab={{{ [enlistfirst[]] }}} > <$macrocall $name={{{ tab[get[text]elsetitlecase[]]+[split[ ]join[]] }}}/>
WARNING: The buttons are not properly turned on when turning off read only. For now, use the <$button actions=<>>Reset button.

Keep it alive and thriving by showing your support on [[Ko-fi|https://ko-fi.com/telumire]] today! 🤗 <<< " }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230425225538415", "text": ".tc-tiddlylink.tc-tiddlylink-shadow{cursor:pointer;}", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/styles/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230425225628709" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab": { "created": "20230424221125460", "text": "\define link-to-controlpanel-tab-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-1749438307" text=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1963855381" text=<> /> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end \define link-to-controlpanel-tab-separator()<$list filter="[!match[yes]]"><$text text=<<__separator__>>/> \define link-to-controlpanel-tab-template(separator) <$tiddler tiddler=<> ><$button tag="a" actions=<> class="tc-tiddlylink tc-tiddlylink-shadow"><$transclude field="caption"><$transclude field="title"/><> \define link-to-controlpanel-tab(caption:"""<$list filter="$:/ControlPanel [] []" counter="depth" variable="navigateTo">< ">>""",prefix,sub-tab) <$let prefix={{{ [<__prefix__>!is[blank]]:else[{!!title}split[/]first[4]join[/]] }}} sub-tab={{{ [<__sub-tab__>!is[blank]]:else[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]] }}} main-tab={{{ [tags[]prefix[$:/tags/ControlPanel/]trim[$:/tags/]] :map[[$:/tags/ControlPanel]tagging[]search{!!title}] }}} tv-wikilinks="no" ><<__caption__>> \end", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Commons/macros/openControlPanelTab", "modified": "20230427014434856", "code-body": "yes" }} }
